Title: SUSHEEL | Personal Webpage
Name: IT
Description: Information technology is the study, design, development, implementation, support or management of computer-based information systems.
AboutContent: I’m a Computer Science major by day, a Table Tennis player by evening, a functional wantrepreneur by midnight and a hustler always.
If you can’t find me, it’s because I’m already cycling, off to a hike, or studying for an exam
I am passionate about Space Technology and Human Psychology (though, never studied them formally). A die-hard fan of Elon Musk.
I love the way the concept of "work" has evolved over the past decades, and hence would love to travel and work together whenever I can.
WorkContent: I am currently full time Software Developer Engineer at Microsoft.

InternShips.name: Computer Vision Center, Universitat Autonoma de Barcelona

CVStartLine: I am always open to collaborations with impactful work. Feel free to reach out if you want to work together :)
